original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, postLinks as pl, postHistory as ph, votes as v, badges as b, users as u WHERE p.Id = pl.RelatedPostId AND b.UserId = u.Id AND c.UserId = u.Id AND p.Id = v.PostId AND p.Id = c.PostId AND p.Id = ph.PostId AND c.Score=0 AND c.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-26 17:09:48' AS TIMESTAMP) AND p.PostTypeId=1 AND p.AnswerCount>=0 AND p.CommentCount>=0 AND p.CommentCount<=14 AND pl.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-10-27 10:02:57' AS TIMESTAMP) AND pl.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-04 17:23:50' AS TIMESTAMP) AND ph.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-11 20:09:41' AS TIMESTAMP) AND v.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-21 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP) AND v.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-14 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.Score = 0 AND comments.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-26 17:09:48'
CREATE VIEW E7 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E7 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E7 WHERE E1.UserId=E7.Id)

CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes WHERE CAST(votes.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-21 00:00:00' AND CAST(votes.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-14 00:00:00'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E7E5 AS SELECT * FROM E1E7 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E1E7.PostId=E5.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.PostTypeId = 1 AND posts.AnswerCount >= 0 AND (CAST(posts.CommentCount AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(posts.CommentCount AS INTEGER) <= 14)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E7E5E2 AS SELECT * FROM E1E7E5 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1E7E5.PostId=E2.Id)

CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postLinks AS postLinks WHERE CAST(postLinks.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-10-27 10:02:57' AND CAST(postLinks.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-04 17:23:50'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E7E5E2E3 AS SELECT * FROM E1E7E5E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1E7E5E2.PostId=E3.RelatedPostId)
CREATE VIEW E6 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E7E5E2E3E6 AS SELECT * FROM E1E7E5E2E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E6 WHERE E1E7E5E2E3.UserId=E6.UserId)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory WHERE postHistory.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-11 20:09:41'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E7E5E2E3E6E4 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E7E5E2E3E6 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E1E7E5E2E3E6.PostId=E4.PostId)
